product_name: Native Eyewear Patroller Polarized Sunglasses - Gunmetal/Iron
long_description: Built for high-octane endeavors, these lightweight shades cut glare while preserving depth perception and contouring your nose with a soft, personalized fit. Designed for larger faces.
